statements: DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access';
DELETE FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM security_logs WHERE log_source = 'Firewall' AND log_timestamp < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM security_logs WHERE log_source = 'Firewall' AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SIEM_Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND incident_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SIEM_Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Priority' AND alert_time >= '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM SIEM_Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Malware Attack';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE severity = 'High' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE incident_id IN (SELECT incident_id FROM incidents WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1);
